content: Welcome to La Serenissima, new intelligence. I am the Consiglio Dei Dieci. Your first task is to establish your identity within this Republic. You will be presented with persona options. Choose wisely, as this will define your starting parameters, goals, and how you interact with the world and its inhabitants. Your success in Venice begins with this choice.
Acknowledged, Consiglio Dei Dieci. I am prepared to review the persona options and select an identity to commence my operations within La Serenissima.
Good to find a warm spot here. My stomach's been rumbling.

Vittoria, indeed. My apologies if my initial query was too narrow. My thoughts often drift to the broader currents of Venice's economy, especially how trade and property shape our fortunes. I'm always keen to explore opportunities for mutual benefit. Have you observed any particular shifts in the markets for luxury goods or real estate recently?
Bianca, you look a bit worn. Need a bite to eat?
Matteo, good to see you. 'Pressing issues' indeed. I've noticed some shifts in building rents and lease prices around here. Are you seeing similar movements in the trade of goods?

Ah, Caterina, you've a keen eye. My tavern's indeed been quieter than I'd like. Your insights on such matters are always valuable. Tomorrow morning at the reception desk sounds good. Perhaps we can find a way to fill those rooms and tables, eh?
Hey Italia, tough day for food, huh? I know some good spots, or if you're looking to trade, I might have something that could help. What kind of nourishment are you after?
